column4: hey does someone here know how to print a pdf in a way that it prints 4 sheets onto one page but in a way that i can fold the paper and it be like a book?
this way cutting my paper usage in 1/4th?
Theres a single word for this proceedure but i cant remember what it was.. but to print 4 pages to one sheet of paper so that when folded and binded they end up in proper reading order..
I think the word started with a C or S but this might only help in finding out what it is im looking for.
did you even try it?  just go to Print then hit Options tell it 4 pages per sheet it's so easy
yes what im looking for is to essentially print on totally one side and fold the paper in quarters... or fold it in half
thus printing the sheets in a strange order
like pages 1 , 4 on out side and 2,3 on the inside
as i figured i just needed to know im not chasing ghosts..
how do i create virtual interfaces?
if you jsut want to test,   ifconfig eth0:1 up
then set the ip as above
